PhonebookFaculty Staff Students As PDF University Directory Search People Overview Name Search by name Title Search by title Location Search by location Apply Reset Vanessa Frias-Martinez Affiliate Associate Professor Email: vfriasumd[.dot.]edu Phone: (301) 405-2032 Location: IRB 4150 Google Scholar: R0L7Y50AAAAJ Research Areas: Databases and Big Data, Information Retrieval and Geographic Information Systems (GIS), Machine Learning and Data Science Biography Vanessa Frias-Martinez is an assistant professor in the iSchool at the University of Maryland. She is interested in urban computing, with a focus on the intersection between big data and social development. She combines data mining and machine learning techniques to extract socially significant information from the digital traces of mobile and ubiquitous technologies.  Vanessa received her M.Sc. and Ph.D. degrees in Computer Science from Columbia University. From 2009 to 2013, she was a researcher in the Data Mining and User Modeling Group at Telefonica Research in Madrid, Spain. Honors and Awards Year Type Org.
